sentences.en: Cubism was hard to read, willfully ambiguous , and yet demotic too.
sentences.cn: 立体派很难理解, 恣意地前后矛盾, 然而它却通俗.

sentences.en: Everything is for the Demotic Benefit Animadvert on " Bureaucracy Standard " and " Money Standard "
sentences.cn: 一切为了人民的利益—— “ 官本位 ” 、 “ 钱本位 ” 批判.

sentences.en: It is television's demotic style of language.
sentences.cn: 这是电视通俗的语言风格。

trans.tran_en: used by or popular with most ordinary people
